definitions.text: the original amount of a debt on which interest is calculated
the educator who has executive authority for a school
examples: she sent unruly pupils to see the principal

definitions.text: an actor who plays a principal role
capital as contrasted with the income derived from it
(criminal law) any person involved in a criminal offense, regardless of whether the person profits from such involvement
the major party to a financial transaction at a stock exchange; buys and sells for his own account

examples: the main doors were of solid glass
